author: andschwa
body: Had to get the TFS enlistments  thanks Matt Ellis  and learn how to build manually. Can now take a build number and find the corresponding TFS changeset as well as the corresponding Git commits in CoreCLR and CoreFX.  Patched and deployed.  VSO create date - 10/6/2015 15:40:00     VSO closed date - 10/6/2015 15:41:00
title: Patch CoreCLR TFS build 23214
